full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): #, ,BSTAN PA YONGS RDZOGS KYI SROG SHING TU LHAG PAR GCES PA LAS 'BRAS KYI RNAM GZHAG RNAM PAR 'BYED CING GSAL BAR BSHAD PA'I LAS 'BRAS GSAL BA'I ME LONG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO,, ,,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @067B (CES LAS 'BRAS KYI RNAM GZHAG GSAL BOR STON PA GSAL BA'I ME LONG ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, ,RIG GNAS LA SPYANGS PA MI DMAN PA MER GEN CHOS RJE YE SHES DPAL LDAN GYIS YANG YANG BSKUL BA DANG, ,RANG GIS KYANG LAS 'BRAS LA YID CHES KYIS NGES PA BSKYED PA'I PHYIR DANG, ,KHO BOS BRIS PA'I LAM RIM KHRID CHEN GYIS LHAN THABS SU YANG 'GYUR RAM SNYAM DU BTZUN PA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS KYIS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI MKHYEN RAB YANGS PA THO YON 'JAM DBYANGS DON GRUB PO, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG, ,, @068A SVA STI, RGYAL BAS MDZAD PA GSUNG RAB MTHA' YAS KUN, ,SNYING PO'I GNAD BSDU RAB GSAL ME LONG DU, BAG CHAGS 'JOG PHYIR DAD PAS 'BRI KLOG DANG, ,BAR DU BRKOS SOGS 'BREL BA BZHAG PA DGE, ,'DI MTHUS DGE 'DUN 'DUS SDE'I KHRIMS GTZANG ZHING, ,BSTAN 'DZIN BLA MA'I ZHABS PAR BRTAN PA DANG, ,SBYIN BDAG BTZO BYAS MA GYUR SEMS CAN KUN, ,DON GNYIS MTHAR PHYIN SANGS RGYAS MYUR THOB SHOG, ,, BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG, SARBA MANGGA LAM, , DGE'O, ,)
